name: Cosmic Banshee Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Grant immunity to Doom and Stun effects to all allies until they die
Grant Perfect Trap and Perfect Heal Shield to each ally for 1 turn every turn

Revive with full HP, remove all negative effects from all allies, including Silver Effects, and make them immune to all negative effects, including innate and unblockable stun, permadeath, taunt, and skill disabling effects, for the duration of battle when you die
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to a Banshee character.
